name: BruzBeers
0:
”Alexa, open Bruise Beers”
”What food truck is there today”
”What food truck is there next Thursday”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bruise beers
des: Simply ask Bruz Beer what food truck is there today, or any day in the future.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
